description:
A monk goes to a temple for spiritual training.
An Eggplant Grannie reportedly shows up at a secluded mountain temple.
There was a tengu who used an Invisibility Cape to pull pranks on people.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakemonodera / Nasubi Baa / Tengu no Kakure Mino
Monster Temple / Eggplant Grannie / The Tengu`s Invisibility Cape
化物寺 / なすび婆 / 天狗のかくれ蓑
